messages.messageBody:
The sci-fi thread reminded me of this one for independent reading or
family read-aloud. We just finished reading "Skellig". The main
character is a boy who finds a man (bum? angel?) living in his garage.
His parents are preoccupied with his baby sister, who is not well. The
neighbor girl is homeschooled. They strike up a friendship and attempt
to help the strange man, who is not quite of this world.

Mary Ellen
March is National Nutrition Month
Did you eat your 5 today?
(fruits and vegetables, that is!)
